name: read
description: Read file and return AnnData object.

params.name: backed
params.annotation: If 'r', load AnnData in backed mode instead of fully loading it into memory (memory mode). If you want to modify backed attributes of the AnnData object, you need to choose 'r+'.

params.name: sheet
params.annotation: Name of sheet/table in hdf5 or Excel file.

params.name: ext
params.annotation: Extension that indicates the file type, if not provided, use the extension of filename
